about_the_game:
“On the day of what she believed to be her ‘Happy ending’, Cinderella witnesses the collapse of her universe and the murder of her beloved. With the help of a magic grimoire, in search of the truth, she walks into various fairy tales, through worlds that are now disturbing and enigmatic. Fighting enemies corrupted by a strange curse, the princess becomes a mighty warrior, determined to resolve this chaos.”

• A shoe that becomes a bloodthirsty weapon!
Main weapon of the game, it will allow our heroine to perform a series of attacks, counter-attacks and various blows. This magic sword is actually an invocation of the magic grimoire. It will only appear in the combat phase.



• Pervasive corruption:
With each swing of her sword, Cinderella will absorb part of the corruption of the universe, which can be released thanks to the invocations of the Magic Grimoire, offered by her Guardian. When this corruption becomes too intense, the player can decide to put the heroine in a phase of transcendence.



• Summons
A choice of summon, having the appearance of magic weapons consuming corruption, can be made in the middle of combat via a selection wheel and a “Bullet time” mode. Some enemies will be more or less sensitive to the chosen Spells in order to make the fight more complex.

• Collectables:
Throughout your adventure, you will collect artifacts by killing your enemies or by smashing the many destructible objects in the environment. A dedicated space in the Grimoire will allow you to unlock and improve the various summons.



• A BADASS loss of control?
During sword fights, a transcendence gauge fills with corruption. When it is full, the player can choose to trigger it at any time. Our warrior then falls into a murderous madness, making her faster, more powerful and armed with a cursed weapon with spectacular effects. A short-lived but most satisfying “God Mode Badass”.

• Help for Puzzles: sidekicks.
Each villain will have a specific ability that will allow Cinderella to unlock passages in the proposed worlds. Their combination will make it possible to create increasingly complex puzzle mechanics.
They will be necessary for the discovery of the secret content of the game and to obtain the 100%!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10700F @ 2.90GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A dark fantasy 3D adventure in Cinderella Chronicles. Use magic and wield a bloodthirsty shoe sword to battle corrupted enemies, transcend into badass mode, and solve puzzles with sidekicks. Unravel the truth behind a mysterious curse and embark on an epic journey to save the tales from darkness !
